text: @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson @UniofOxford Looking like a person totally in charge. At the helm. Has a plan. Got PPE in hand and track and trace also. Minimal deaths from COVID19 and the country coming out of lockdown securely. Oops sorry mistook @BorisJohnson for Jacinda Ardern.
